title: RAG from Scratch
description: Developed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot entirely from scratch, implementing custom embeddings, a vector store, and LLM integration without LangChain. Currently experimenting with different embedding models to enhance accuracy and performance. Open to building similar solutions contact me for collaboration.

title: Trippy - Travel & Tourism Website
description: A modern and responsive travel & tourism website built with React, showcasing stunning destinations, recent trips, and essential travel information. Features include a dynamic hero section, destination galleries, trip showcases, and fully responsive pages such as Home, About, Services, and Contact. The UI is clean and visually appealing, designed with modular CSS for maintainability. This project highlights React Router-based navigation, reusable components, and a smooth browsing experience.
